title: Chat disconnected
body: Is it just me or is the chat not working, I'm on eune. And my friend (new to the game) just installed it and I open and find the chat disconnected, I tried manually connecting but got nothing, any help?

replies.body:
Some players are having trouble connecting to chat, and a fix is in the works now!  Updates are being made at our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#eune) page.  You'll be able to chat again and give your friend a tour of the rift!  
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
